39 void instant::convPosePx(nav_msgs::OdometryConstPtr i) {
40  pose_ = i->pose.pose; // extracts pose
41  angle_ = tf::getYaw(pose_.orientation) * 180.0 / M_PI; // Converts the quaternion yaw to a simple angle in degrees
42  x_ = pose_.position.x; // Holds x coordiance
43  y_ = pose_.position.y; // Holds y coordinance
44 }
